title: Food Rating Prediction
description: This project investigates the relationship between recipe characteristics—particularly calories—and user-generated ratings. Using recipes and ratings posted since 2008 on Food.com, we will build predictive models to understand how nutritional content influences user ratings.

title: San Diego Bus Route Optimizer
description: Built a bus route optimizer to find the fastest paths using Dijkstra's algorithm and visualize with Plotly.

title: N-Gram Language Model
description: This project implements an N-Gram Language Model to generate and predict sequences of text based on learned probability distributions. The model estimates the probability of a word given its previous context using n-gram statistics.

title: Loan Application EDA
description: This project explores and analyzes a real-world dataset of approved loan applications from LendingClub. It investigates how borrower characteristics influence loan terms, interest rates, and risk assessment by lenders.
